subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: If Rory McIlroy or Jordan Spieth overtakes Jason Day after this week’s Tour Championship, it will be the first time since 1997 that there has been a different No. 1 in five consecutive weeks.
snippet: If Rory McIlroy or Jordan Spieth overtakes Jason Day after this week’s Tour Championship, it will be the first time since 1997 that there has been a different No. 1 in five consecutive weeks.
